name: The Magic School Bus: Oceans
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Hop on The Magic School Bus to explore an ocean teeming with life!



Play seven games with just under 200 science interactions! Earn points to unlock ocean ares to explore and learn hundreds of facts about underwater life! As Ms. Frizzle says -- WAHOO!

Features

• Join Ms. Frizzle’s class on an adventurous field trip!• Drive the Bus and explore fun trivia challenges.• Learn over 100 facts about 100 sea animals!• Earn points to dive deeper into the six ocean depths.
